Refresh cache
To refresh data when working with object types, as well as in case of changes to
system settings
, cache refreshing is required.
Cache refreshing applies only to On-Premise solutions.
In SaaS systems, caching functionality is unavailable since the method used is not required.
To refresh the System cache, navigate to the object type registry by selecting the following menu items: Administration → Object management → Object types.
In the opened registry, click the
button in the
control panel
, then confirm the action by clicking "Yes" in the opened modal window.
Cache refreshing is available only if the user has the
"Invalidate cache" permission
.
Upon completion, the System will notify that the command has been executed:
